Text: Yoshiki Tonogai:  He is notable as the illustrator of one of the "Higurashi When They Cry" manga adaptations: "Himatsubushi-hen", or Time Killing Arc.

Text: Yoshiki Tonogai:  "Doubt" has been published in the US by Yen Press in its entirety in 2 volumes in April and July 2013, and the entire six book series of "Judge" and the three book series of "Secret" have been published by them as well.
